testcase.name: Create a Facility, turn on API feature, create an API token and Upload a Study
Validate StatShare Settings and Manual TAB , remove all recent emails, validate email format and create a StatShare and cancel of send and resend of StatShare from exam list, shares out TAB

Validate Recent TAB elements, modify expiration views/days, create duplicate share, create a second StatShare and Favorite TAB elements, # of share emails and listed order, # of shares, choose a favorite and Share from favorite TAB, remove favorite, remove a single recent share,
Validate total # of shares and revoke all shares from exam list > shares out TAB and Create a StatShare, launch StatShare URL, validate passcode, customer support elements and view Shared exam
